sentences.en: As she passed the library door, the telephone began to ring.
sentences.cn: 她经过图书室门口时，电话响了。

sentences.en: I ran across her in the public library yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我昨天在公共图书馆碰巧遇见了她.

sentences.en: I was going to pop up to the local library.
sentences.cn: 我正打算到邻近的图书馆跑一趟。

sentences.en: I went to the library and took your books back.
sentences.cn: 我去了图书馆，帮你把书还了。

sentences.en: My thanks go to the British School of Osteopathy, for the use of their library.
sentences.cn: 感谢不列颠骨疗法学校允许我使用他们的藏书。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: Radios are not permitted in the library.
sentences.cn: 图书馆内不许使用收音机。

sentences.en: She's got the nicest little house not far from the library.
sentences.cn: 她有一幢非常漂亮的小房子，就在离图书馆不远处。

sentences.en: Shelves were built to adapt the library for use as an office.
sentences.cn: 为将图书馆改作办公室而做了一些架子。

sentences.en: Staff are encouraged to use the library for professional self-development.
sentences.cn: 鼓励员工利用图书馆提高自己的专业水平。

sentences.en: The books in the library are classified according to subject.
sentences.cn: 图书馆的书按学科分类。

sentences.en: The library will be officially opened by the local MP.
sentences.cn: 图书馆将由当地下院议员正式揭幕。

sentences.en: The rioters torched the local library.
sentences.cn: 暴乱者放火烧了当地的图书馆。

sentences.en: The shopping centre also incorporates a library and a bank.
sentences.cn: 商业中心还包括一家银行和一家图书馆.

sentences.en: Which journals does the library subscribe to?

words.tran_cn: 图书馆事业；图书馆管理员职位；图书馆管理业务

phrases.tran_cn: 图书馆学；图书馆科学硕士
图书馆服务；程序库服务
流动图书馆；图书馆车；宣传车
公共图书馆；公立图书馆
n. 专供学者与专家做深入研究的图书馆

trans.tran_cn: 图书馆，藏书楼，藏书，书屋，书斋，图书出租处
trans.tran_en: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed
a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed
